actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 13 of title 38, United States Code, to make eligible for dependency and indemnity compensation widows of veterans who die of non-service-connected causes but who were at the time of death totally disabled as the result of one or more service-connected disabilities.

summary.text: Extends eligibility for dependency and indemnity compensation to widows of veterans who die of non-service-connected causes but who were at the time of death totally disabled as the result of one or more service-connected disabilities. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 410,411)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 13 of title 38, United States Code, to make eligible for dependency and indemnity compensation widows of veterans who die of non-service-connected causes but who were at the time of death totally disabled as the result of one or more service-connected disabilities.
